name: Teensy Watch Games Pack8: 2-in-1
description:
Teensy Watch Games Pack 8 has two awesome games for your Apple Watch.

- Find the Difference

See how well your memory does! Guess the right object after it is shown to you for a couple of seconds. Keep guessing correctly to score the highest!

- Find the Odd One

Put your visual thinking skills to the test. Quickly recognize the odd one before the time runs out!


Support and Feedback:

If you have any technical issue please contact us at teensystudios@gmail.com.
Please include the device information and if possible send a screenshot of the problem.
The more information that you provide to us, the better we can serve you and
fix the bugs that may exist. Thank you.
